abstract: Dashboard camera footage released by Blountstown, Fla, police reveals Barbara Dawson lay in parking lot of Liberty Calhoun Hospital for 18 minutes after local police forcibly removed her from hospital and arrested her on charges of disorderly conduct and trespassing; Dawson later died; lawyers on behalf of family say video supports their claim of negligence by local police and hospital.
lead_paragraph: A woman who died after being forcibly removed from a Blountstown hospital lay in the parking lot beside a police officer’s car for nearly 18 minutes before a doctor readmitted her.

headline.main: Florida: Tape Released in Hospital Parking Lot Death
headline.print_headline: South; Florida: Tape Released in Hospital Parking Lot Death

snippet: A woman who died after being forcibly removed from a Blountstown hospital lay in the parking lot beside a police officer’s car for nearly 18 minutes before a doctor readmitted her.
